name: The Ragdoll
description:
The Ragdoll is a fast-paced, action filled fighting game, which looks back to our childhood-favorite stickman fight games but with modern twists.
In this game you'll have the chance to have fun either alone or with your friends and even with strangers.

The 1.0 version will contain:

-Three different, themed tournaments
-Dozens of unlockable skins
-Dozens of different items
-15+ maps
-Local quick game and co-op tournaments with a friend
-Online co-op tournaments and a few PvP game modes
-Full controller support
-Probably dozens of achievements
-Puns

This game is a product of mostly 2 people so it's a true indie game. But don't get that wrong, there is a lot of soul and caring in this game and will be more in the future.
